data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12.0.1 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: The ID you get via long holding is the channel ID and not the ID of the user.
data.expected_result: The IDs should be the same one for long holding a DM and the user profile.
data.short_description: Copying an ID of a DM via long holding copies the channel instead of User ID
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your DMs - Long hold any DM - Copy the ID and write it down for comparison later - Go to the profile of the user - Copy the ID - Compare the IDs
